name: ownorm
description: A custom ORM built with TypeScript to seamlessly connect with MySQL and MariaDB, providing an efficient and flexible database management solution.

name: ecommerce
description: A full-stack eCommerce platform developed with React and TypeScript on the frontend, powered by a NestJS backend and PostgreSQL database for scalable and robust performance.

name: bank
description: A banking application featuring an Angular frontend, a secure and high-performance backend built with Java, and a PostgreSQL database for reliable financial transactions.
